sentences.english: High relief and shallow relief is relative to the two types.
sentences.chinese: 高浮雕與淺浮雕是相對的兩種類型。

sentences.english: High relief and shallow relief is relative to the two types.
sentences.chinese: 高浮雕與淺浮雕是相對的兩種類型。

sentences.english: Vishnu changed for the dwarf and Beelzebub fighting to save the world's religious story of relief.
sentences.chinese: 毗溼奴變作侏儒與魔王戰鬥拯救世界的宗教故事浮雕。

sentences.english: His relief sculpture in Shanghai Long Hua Martyrs' Cemetery can prove it.
sentences.chinese: 上海龍華烈士陵園中他的浮雕可引以爲證。

sentences.english: The ancient Greek Parthenon is famed for its beautiful sculpture in bas-relief.
sentences.chinese: 古希臘的帕臺農神殿因其美麗的浮雕雕塑而聞名。

sentences.english: To create the embossing effect, the text is drawn twice.
sentences.chinese: 若要創建浮雕效果，請將文本繪製兩次。

sentences.english: Use the image below for the values of the Bevel and Emboss .
sentences.chinese: 用這個底層的圖片爲斜面與浮雕設置值。

sentences.english: It is the opposite of embossing .
Thin serifs do not emboss well unless they are large and well defined.
sentences.chinese: 不薄襯線浮雕，除非它們是大而明確的。

sentences.english: And this relief shows the connection and the relation between Cleopatra and Isis.
sentences.chinese: 這幅浮雕展示了克利奧帕特拉和伊希斯的關係。

sentences.english: Love these two emboss style bookmarks.
sentences.chinese: 很喜歡這兩張浮雕式的書籤。

sentences.english: Putrefied lotus leaves, and moonlight casts a basso-relievo.
sentences.chinese: 嫋娜地升起，月光投下一塊浮雕。

sentences.english: Foldover flap with embossed logo and exposed zip pocket at front.
sentences.chinese: Foldover瓣浮雕圖案和前暴露拉鍊口袋。

sentences.english: The souvenir medal is made of pure silver, adopting the embossment color printing technology.
sentences.chinese: 此款紀念牌分爲純銀材質，浮雕彩印工藝。

sentences.english: Hundreds of statues were beheaded and a number of bas-reliefs removed.
sentences.chinese: 數以百計的雕像被砍頭，大批的淺浮雕被運走。

definition: white marble/a type of white marble used for building and sculpting
vivid and lifelike (idiom); true to life/realistic
variant of 鎦金|镏金[liu2 jin1]
